completed_on.description: The date/time when the project was marked as completed (as UNIX timestamp)

id.description: The unique ID of the project

is_completed.description: True if the project is marked as completed and false otherwise

show_announcement.description: True to show the announcement/description and false otherwise

url.description: The address/URL of the project in the user interface

suite_mode.description: The suite mode of the project (1 for single suite mode, 2 for single suite + baselines, 3 for multiple suites) (added with TestRail 4.0)
